summary: The state of Texas is divided into 254 counties.
full_text: Ward County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas. As of the 2010 census, the population was 10,658. The county seat is Monahans. The county was created in 1887 and organized in 1892. It is named for Thomas W. Ward, a soldier in the Texas Revolution.
title: Ward County, Texas
